full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 79 of 236 983 LC3Cmax3 Alessi - cross and page 191, lines 2 through 6. Q. Have you had the opportunity to review that, Mr. Alessi? A. Can you repeat the number. Q. Sure. Page 190 beginning at line 15. A. Okay. Sir, I cannot see the number of the page. Okay, now I do. Yes, sir. Q. Does that refresh your memory, Mr. Alessi, that, as you understood it, Ms. Maxwell went into Mar-a-Lago for some form of treatment? A. No, I think she was looking for -- because we -- I don't know if she went in for a treatment or not. Q. Isn't it true that you testified, as I understand it, Ms. Maxwell went into Mar-a-Lago for some form of treatment, correct, and you said yes. Do you see that? A. Yes, sir. Q. And that was your testimony under oath; correct? A. Yes. Q. And then the question was: "Q. So you were waiting outside for about an hour?" Do you see that, line 22? A. Yes. Q. And you said, "Right." Do you see that? A. Yes. Q. And that was your testimony under oath; correct? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012593
